Plate Heat Exchangers

Home

>>

Plate Heat Exchangers

Salama Engineering has distinguished itself as the exclusive representative of Tranter International AB, Sweden, Tranter Inc., USA, and Tranter India. Our mandate is based on providing new units, spares, technical assistance and full service packages for all products from Tranter.

Tranter manufactures a wide range of gasketed and welded plate heat exchangers, with R&D units located in Wichita Falls, USA, and Pune, India.

Most of our products are AHRI certified and designed in line with ASME and PED standards.

For over a decade, Tranter Plate Heat Exchangers have been utilized across various industries in Saudi Arabia, including Oil & Gas, Petrochemical, Steel, Power, Marine, and Desalination sectors.

Discover the Best from SALAMA Engineering Today!

Explore Our Products

Products

SUPERCHANGER Gasketed Plate Heat Exchangers:

https://www.tranter.com/heat-exchangers/superchanger-plate-frame-heat-exchanger/
  • Flow range up to 4600 M3/hr
  • Max. working Pressure up to 25 bar
  • Temperature range -40 to 180 Deg C
  • Connection size from 25 to 500mm
  • SS304 / SS316 / Titanium / SMO 254 /HAST C / Nickel / Ti.Pd Plates
  • NBR / EPDM / Viton gaskets
  • Double wall Plates for application is vital that media are not mixed.
  • Wide gap Plates for fiber and particle-rich fluids

Services

The Salama Plate Heat Exchanger Division provides a wide range of services including installation, commissioning, inspection, assessment, parts sourcing, and chemical mechanical and re-gasketing cleaning.

Installation

Our application team has extensive experience in setting up and commissioning plate coolers according to manufacturer guidelines. We also provide inline piping and isolation cocks for seamless on-site system integration, ensuring optimal performance and reliable operation.

Inspection and Evaluation

The specialists from SALAMA’s technical department are trained in anticipating operational problems associated with Plate Heat Exchangers and providing trouble-shooting in context to select applications. We assist the customers with specific technical solutions to make sure that the heat exchanger systems operate optimally.

Sourcing and Supply parts

We supply OEM components for Tranter and other reputable multi-brand plate heat exchangers, which are customized according to the needs of the clients and the specific applications. Our offers warrant consistent performance, increased equipment longevity, and better productivity in accordance to the industrial norms and the clients' needs.

Chemical Cleaning

Salama Engineering offers a chemical cleaning process for Plate Heat Exchangers with the powerful chemical agents which are based on operating fluid. We also offer chemical cleaning through a circulation process (CIP) to effectively clean the units.

Mechanical Cleaning

Our Mechanical cleaning categories for Plate Heat Exchangers include onsite pressure jet wash, brush manual cleaning, and chemical immersion cleaning depending on fouling episodes.

Re-Gasketing

We offer complete re-gasketing solutions for Tranter units along with various multi-brand Plate Heat Exchangers to improve performance, dependability, and equipment longevity.
